data.name: DLG_MISSION_CONTINUE_CONFIRM
data.value: Do you really want to leave?

data.name: DLG_MISSION_CONTINUE_NO_ONGOING
data.value: You have no more ongoing missions beyond this point.\nWould you like to leave the dungeon now?

data.name: DLG_MISSION_CONTINUE_ONGOING
data.value: You have more ongoing missions, but would you like to leave the dungeon now?

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_SPAWN_FAIL
data.value: But the outlaw doesn't seem to be around...

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_REACHED
data.value: Wanted outlaw spotted!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_FLEE
data.value: Waah! A-adventurers! Run for it!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_FLED
data.value: {0} escaped...

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_MONSTER_HOUSE
data.value: You've fallen into my trap!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_DEFEATED
data.value: Yes!\nKnocked out outlaw {0}!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_ITEM_RETRIEVED
data.value: Yes!\nYou reclaimed the {1}!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_ITEM_UNK_DEFEATED
data.value: Huh?\n{0} dropped the {1}![br]Yes!\n{0} was the outlaw!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_ITEM_UNK_RETRIEVED
data.value: Huh?\n{0} was holding the {1}![br]Yes!\n{0} was the outlaw!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_HOUSE_DEFEATED
data.value: Yes!\nKnocked out outlaw {0} and goons!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_BOSS_DEFEATED
data.value: Yes! You defeated {0}! Defeat the rest of the goons!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_OUTLAW_MINIONS_DEFEATED
data.value: Grr! You won't be able to defeat me!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_RESCUE_FOUND
data.value: Yes! You've found {0}!\nDo you want to use your badge to rescue {0}?

data.name: DLG_MISSION_RESCUE_CONFIRM
data.value: Your badge shines on {0}, and {0} is transported away magically!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_DELIVERY_FOUND
data.value: Yes! You've located {0}! Do you want to deliver the requested {1} to {0}?

data.name: DLG_MISSION_DELIVERY_CONFIRM
data.value: Thanks for the {0}!\n I'll see you in town after with your reward!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_DELIVERY_DENY
data.value: Oh, please! I really need that {0}...

data.name: DLG_MISSION_DELIVERY_NO_ITEM
data.value: The requested {1} isn't in the Treasure Bag.\nThere is nothing to deliver.

data.name: DLG_MISSION_DELIVERY_NO_ITEM_CHAR
data.value: Huh, you don't have the {0}? That's too bad...

data.name: DLG_MISSION_TARGET_LEFT
data.value: {0} escaped from the dungeon!

data.name: DLG_MISSION_LOST_ITEM_RETRIEVED
data.value: Yes! You found {0}'s {1}!

data.name: MISSION_EXPLORATION_INTERACT
data.value: Please, take me to {0} {1}!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_LOVER_INTERACT
data.value: Please, bring me to my love! I'm counting on you!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_INTERACT
data.value: I'm counting on you to bring me to {0}!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_ADD
data.value: Added {0} to the party as a guest.

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_ADD_PLURAL
data.value: Added {0} to the party as guests.

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_FAINTED
data.value: Oh, no! {0} fainted!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_REACHED
data.value: Yes! You completed {0}'s escort mission.\n{0} is delighted!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_THANKS
data.value: Thank you for escorting me to {0}!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_DEPART
data.value: {0}'s twosome left the dungeon!

data.name: MISSION_ESCORT_UNAVAILABLE
data.value: ...{0} doesn't seem to be around.

data.name: MISSION_EXPLORATION_REACHED
data.value: Yes! You've reached the target floor with {0}!

data.name: MISSION_EXPLORATION_THANKS
data.value: Thank you for exploring the dungeon with me!

data.name: MISSION_EXPLORATION_DEPART
data.value: {0} left the dungeon!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_CONFIRM_DEFAULT
data.value: Thanks for the rescue!\nI'll see you in town after with your reward!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_CONFIRM_CHILD
data.value: Thank you for rescuing me! This place was so scary! I can't wait to see my family again!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_CONFIRM_FRIEND
data.value: Oh, my friend sent you to rescue me? Thank goodness! We'll see you in town later to say thanks!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_CONFIRM_RIVAL
data.value: Tch, my rival sent you to rescue me, huh? Well, thank you. We'll reward you later in town.

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_CONFIRM_LOVER
data.value: Oh, my beloved {0} sent you to rescue me? I can't wait to reunite with them!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_DENY_DEFAULT
data.value: H-hey! Don't just leave me here!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_DENY_CHILD
data.value: Waaah! It's s-scary here! P-please help me!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_DENY_FRIEND
data.value: Please don't leave me here! My friend is probably worried sick!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_DENY_RIVAL
data.value: Woah, don't just leave me hanging here!

data.name: MISSION_RESCUE_DENY_LOVER
data.value: Please, get me out of here! I just want to see my dear {0} again!

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_MONEY
data.value: Team {0} received {1}.[pause=40]

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_ITEM
data.value: Team {0} received [a/an] {1}.[pause=40]

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_ITEM_STORAGE
data.value: The {1} was sent to storage.

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_CHAR
data.value: The adventurous exploits of Team {0} are an inspiration to me![br]Please, let me become a member of your team!

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_CHAR_PROMPT
data.value: Accept {1} as a team member?

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_EXTRA
data.value: Your team gained {1} as a reward![pause=40]

data.name: MISSION_COMPLETED_CUTSCENE_AWARD_RANK_UP
data.value: Congratulations![pause=0][br]Team {0} went up in rank from the\n[color=#FFA5FF]{1} Rank[color] to the [color=#FFA5FF]{2} Rank[color]!
